MacOS Mojave 10.14.5 (18F132)

iMac 5k - late16 

Hi, i recently updated my KSP to the newest version. My problem is that KSP is now literally unplayable. I only got around 2-10 FPS and i lost my beloved science savegame. 

Is there any fix to workaround? Is it possible to downgrade the game? It ran absolutely fantastic before. 

Thanks for reading. 

 

Edited October 25, 2019 by cmyk
